NewDialogStrings.TEST_a_helpmetest: "Hey, can you help me debug the mod?"
NewDialogStrings.TEST_cw_starttesting: "Sure, what do you need?" {n}Woljif pauses, then adds,{/n} "You are gonna pay me for beta testing this thing, right?"
NewDialogStrings.TEST_cw_donetesting: "What else do you wanna talk about?"
NewDialogStrings.TEST_cw_toTavern: "Yes! I love when debugging involves free drinks!"
NewDialogStrings.TEST_a_startTavernEtude: "Flag the Tavern Event etude as started."
NewDialogStrings.TEST_PLACEHOLDER: "Whoops! Looks like you haven't written this bit of dialog yet!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_1_a_AreYouOkay: "Are you okay? I've been worried sick about you!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_1_cw_ImOkay: "You have?" {n}Woljif sounds genuinely surprised, but doesn't miss a beat.{/n} "Anyway, yeah, I'm fine, but I could really use your help getting out of this mess right about now, chief!" {n}He pauses for a moment, then adds,{/n} "Uh, thanks for askin'."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2a_c_Invite: "Hey, chief! You've been workin' awful hard on all this crusade stuff. You know what you need? Some time off. Come on, take a little break, join me at the tavern for a drink!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2a_a_IdLoveTo: "I'd love to. I'll be right there!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2a_a_No: "Seriously, Woljif? I don't have time for this sort of thing."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2a_c_ForgetIt: {n}Woljif tries to act unbothered, but the flicking of his tail gives him away.{/n} "Right. You got more important things to do than talk to people like me. Forget I bothered you."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_note_2a_Desc: Woljif would like to talk to the Commander in Drezen.
NewDialogStrings.WRM_note_2a_Ignored: The commander ignored Woljif's request to meet.
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_CrazyStory: "...And that's how I got kicked out of the Covenant. Best part is, it all turned out to be for nothing anyway, 'cause Rora gave everything up to be with that snobby wizard! She coulda been filthy rich, but nope." {n}Woljif shakes his head.{/n} "Love makes people do crazy things, I guess."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_NoodleIncident: "Wait, I still don't get how the vampire got involved."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_NoodleIncident: {n}Woljif shrugs.{/n} "Hells if I know! But he got his hat back, so it all worked out in the end!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_WhenItWorksOut: "When it works out, it's worth it."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_LoveIsTrouble: {n}Woljif laughs.{/n} "You're kidding, right? It's nothing but trouble. You either get your heart broken or you end up stuck in a relationship, having to pay for gifts and flowers, and then if that works out, you have to pay even more for a wedding! No thanks, not worth it!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_NeverLoved: "Nah. I mean, I've had a few crushes, but... I always just tried to ignore them. Getting that close to someone, it's just asking to get hurt, you know?" {n}He looks away for a moment, then shrugs.{/n} "Always got over 'em pretty fast."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_WhatIf: "What if the person in question doesn't want gifts, or flowers, or a fancy wedding? What if they just want to be with you?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_ICouldGoForThat: {n}Woljif moves his mug in a small circle and pensively watches the drink spin as he mulls your question over. After a moment, a hint of a smile tugs at the corners of his mouth.{/n} "Yeah... I guess I could go for something like that."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_IfWishesWereHorses: "But if wishes were horses, right, chief?" {n}He laughs and waves his hand vaguely.{/n} "No point in getting wrapped up in what-ifs."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_LoveMakesPeopleCrazy: "Love makes people do crazy things, indeed."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_YourePayingRight: "Anyway, uh... you were gonna pay for the drinks, right?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_FreeDrinks: "Wait, was this whole thing just a ploy to get free drinks?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_OfCourseNot: {n}Woljif tries to look indignant.{/n} "Of course not! I just wanted to spend some time with you, that's all... But free drinks wouldn't hurt!" {n}He looks at you hopefully and gives you his most charming smile.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_PayForYourself: "No. You pay for your own drinks."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_NoSympathy: "What, no sympathy for a penniless street rat like me? Guess I better find another drinking buddy. Well, thanks anyway for the talk, chief."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_Thanks: {n}Woljif grins broadly.{/n} "I knew I could count on you, chief. We should do this again some time."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_Always: "Of course. Drinks are always on me!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_WowThanks: {n}Woljif grins broadly.{/n} "Really? Ha, I should get drinks with you more often! Thanks, chief!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_a_RunForIt: "No way! We run for the door on three."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_2b_c_OneTwoThree: {n}Woljif chuckles.{/n} "I like your style, chief! Okay, one... two... three!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_shift_2b_PayForYourself: Insisted Woljif pay for his own drinks.
NewDialogStrings.WRM_shift_2b_Always: Told Woljif drinks are always on you.
NewDialogStrings.WRM_shift_2b_RunForIt: Ran from the tavern with Woljif without paying for your drinks.
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_WhatsYourGame: {n}As you approach, Woljif peers up at you from where he's sitting, poking at the remains of your campfire with a stick. His tail swats the ground anxiously, but he remains silent for a moment before speaking.{/n} "Alright, enough beatin' around the bush. What's your game, chief?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_YouWantSomething: {n}The tiefling's tail flicks back and forth even faster and his body tenses.{/n} "C'mon, don't play dumb! You want somethin' from me; I ain't stupid!" {n}Woljif raises his voice with every word, until he's shouting at you.{/n} "You're doing all these nice things for me, makin' it so I owe you, and you're waiting to cash it all in on something big, aren't you? Just tell me what you want, already!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_a_CalmDown: "Woljif, listen to me. Please calm down..."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_a_IWantToBeNice: "Is it really so hard for you to believe I'm being nice to you because I want to? I don't expect anything in return."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_a_GrowUp: "Seriously? You're being ridiculous, Woljif. This is why nobody's nice to you: they try to do something for you and you just throw it back in their face. Grow up."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_a_YouWannaBeMad: "You really don't know how to react to people being kind to you, do you? You're going to get mad no matter what I say."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_StopTheIdiotAct: {n}He stands up, fists clenched. His tail sweeps through the dust behind him in low, wavering arcs.{/n} "Stop with the idiot act, chief. I've been through this before, and you don't fool me!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_CalmDown: {n}He stands up, fists clenched. His tail sweeps through the dust behind him in low, wavering arcs.{/n} "Calm down? What, now you're trying to make me the bad guy?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_NobodysThisNice: {n}He stands up, fists clenched. His tail sweeps through the dust behind him in low, wavering arcs.{/n} "Yeah, it is! Nobody's ever this nice unless they're buttering someone up! There's always strings attached, and I ain't fallin' for it!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_GuiltTrips: {n}For a moment, Woljif looks at you like you've slapped him. Then he looks away, gritting his teeth, and stands up.{/n} "So now I'm the bad guy, huh? I've played this game before, chief, and your guilt trips aren't gonna cut it."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_DontPityMe: {n}He stands up, fists clenched. His tail sweeps through the dust behind him in low, wavering arcs.{/n} "Shove your stupid pity! I don't need it and I don't owe you nothin'!" {n}Woljif turns and storms away, tail whipping violently behind him, but you catch him glancing once over his shoulder at you as he goes.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_NobodysThisNice2: "Yeah, it is! Nobody's ever this nice unless they're buttering someone up! There's always strings attached, and I ain't fallin' for it!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_GuiltTrips2: {n}For a moment, Woljif looks at you like you've slapped him. Then he looks away, gritting his teeth.{/n} "So now I'm the bad guy, huh? I've played this game before, chief, and your guilt trips aren't gonna cut it."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_DontPityMe2: "Shove your stupid pity! I don't need it and I don't owe you nothin'!" {n}Woljif turns and storms away, tail whipping violently behind him, but you catch him glancing once over his shoulder at you as he goes.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3_c_IDontNeedYou: "Ugh. Whatever. I don't need you and your stupid, fake pity, anyway, and I don't owe you nothin'! Just... Leave me alone!" {n}Woljif turns and storms away, tail whipping violently behind him, but you catch him glancing once over his shoulder at you as he goes.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3a_c_DontTalkToMe:
{n}The tiefling glares at you.{/n} "Look, I don't really wanna talk to you right now, chief, so beat it, okay?" 
{n}Woljif is obviously hurting more than he lets on, but he's not ready to let go of his anger just yet. He still needs some time to calm down.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3b_a_OfCourseYouCan: "Of course you can stay! You're always welcome to travel with me."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_3b_c_WarmSmile: {n}Woljif smiles warmly at you.{/n} "Thanks, chief. I won't run off again, I promise." {n}He looks away for a moment, biting his lip.{/n} "Uh, when we're back in Drezen, I need to talk to you. I don't have anybody else. Just come and talk to me then, face to face."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4justfriends_c_Sorry: {n}Woljif scratches the back of his head awkwardly as you approach.{/n} "Uh, hey, chief. Look, I just... I'm sorry about the other day. I admit I might have overreacted a little bit. Let's just put it behind us, alright? You know, forgive and forget."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4justfriends_c_Anyway: "So, is there something you wanted to talk about?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_Sorry: {n}Woljif glances at you as you approach, but quickly drops his gaze to the ground.{/n} "Uh, hey chief. I... I wanted to say I'm sorry for yelling at you the other day." {n}He pauses for a moment, and looks guiltily up at you again.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_Sorry2: {n}Apparently deciding his apology was insufficient before you have a chance to respond, Woljif hurriedly adds to it.{/n} "You didn't deserve that. I just... You're not like anybody I've ever met. It's hard for me to deal with, you know?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_a_WhatDoYouMean: "What do you mean, 'I'm not like anyone you've ever met?'"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_a_YoureStillLearning: "It's okay; I understand. You're not used to people being nice to you. You're still learning how to trust."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_a_ApologyRejected: "You can't just treat people like that and expect an apology will make everything fine again."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_WellYoure: "Well, you're..." {n}Woljif stops, trying to find the words, then just gestures vaguely at you.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_LargerThanLife: "Honestly, I didn't think people like you really existed, chief. I mean, you're this larger-than-life legend. You got something that makes people want to follow you, an' it's not just your magic powers."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_ThatsJustIt: "That's just it. I didn't think people like you really existed, chief. I mean, you're this larger-than-life legend, and you're... someone I can trust, sure. But it's not just that. You got something that makes people want to follow you, an' it's not just your magic powers."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_NothingICanDo: {n}Woljif sighs and looks down, his tail drooping sadly.{/n} "Yeah, you're right. But there's nothing else I can do to fix it now. Look, I won't yell at you like that again."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_ActLikeNothingHappened: "So, let's just act like nothing happened, okay? Got anything else you wanna talk about?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_EvenIWannaFollowYou: "Even I wanna follow you, and you're marching us into the Worldwound! If it was anybody else I'd be halfway to Galt by now, but it's like you make everyone around you lose their minds. You got any idea how scary that makes you?" {n}He laughs nervously, like he's just now realizing how insane this situation is.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_a_IDidntMeanTo: "I'm sorry. I don't mean to scare you."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_a_YouCanTrustMe: "You have nothing to be afraid of. You can trust me, I promise."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_a_IAmScary: "I can't say I blame you. I am pretty scary."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_IBelieveYou: "I believe you! And that's what scares me!" {n}Woljif lets out another bark of anxious, mirthless laughter.{/n} "Everything I know about real people and the real world, it just flies out the window when you're around. And the craziest part is... you make us like it."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_DifferentKindOfScary: {n}Woljif shakes his head, crossing his arms over his chest.{/n} "Naw, you don't get it, chief. You're a different kind of scary. Everything I know about real people and the real world, it just flies out the window when you're around. And the craziest part is... you make us like it."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_a_Understandable: "That's understandable. Thanks for clearing this up."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_WhatsThatMean: {n}The tiefling chokes a little bit, and his face flushes slightly.{/n} "Huh? W-what's that supposed to mean?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_4_c_ChangeTopic: {n}You can see Woljif relax a little.{/n} "Uh, yeah. Glad to put it behind us. Can we talk about something else now?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_wish_c_MissedYou: {n}Woljif is still standing in the middle of the room with his eyes closed.{/n} "Louder, louder! With more feeling! Bow before your king! And now, ol' Galfrey, it's your turn. Hand that crown over here... Hey, why's everyone so quiet?" {n}He opens his eyes and smiles when he sees you.{/n} "Oh, there you are, chief! I was hoping you'd join me for some well-deserved gloating! I mean... did I fall asleep or somethin'?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_wedding_c_CrazyThings: {n}Woljif shrugs and folds his arms over his chest.{/n} "Well, love makes people do crazy things."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_brothel_a_WaitWhat: "Wait, what was that about the priestesses in Drezen?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_brothel_c_SnapOut: {n}Woljif snaps out of his trance. He blinks at you, then looks back at the succubus with a wary and slightly confused expression.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_brothel_c_HoneyTrap: {n}Woljif shrugs and grins sheepishly.{/n} "What can I say? My roguish good looks tend to distract people from their coinpurses. You don't even have to be that good a pickpocket if they want you to touch 'em!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5a_a_DontWanderAlone: "You shouldn't wander around alone out there. I wouldn't be able to forgive myself if something happened to you."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5a_c_TakeCareOfMyself: "Eh? I know how to take care of myself, chief! I don't need anybody lookin' after me!" {n}Despite Woljif's best efforts to seem indignant and aloof, he's clearly flustered, and looks away quickly.{/n} "Look, that's not the point, okay? I... I need to talk to someone about this, chief. I've been thinking a lot, y'know... about myself, about you, about the Moon of the Abyss and...yeah, all right, I'm lyin'. I didn't think, I tried not to think, only the Shadow started talkin' to me, even when I didn't want it to. It told me where to go, that I needed to come to terms with who I am. But maybe I don't wanna understand! Maybe I'm better off bein' kept in the dark!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5a_c_UhThanks: {n}Woljif bites his lip and looks down for a moment, crossing his arms over his chest as his tail sways slowly from side to side.{/n} "Uh... Thanks. I... Thanks."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5a_a_Friends: "Friends don't abandon each other in difficult situations. I want to go with you."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5b_a_DontListen: "Don't listen to him. You're so much more than that. You're smart, funny, and stronger than you think. Forced love isn't really love. All you can do is open your heart and hope they understand. Even if they don't, I do. I always will."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5b_a_HoldHands: [Hold Woljif's hand] "You already have all the power you need. Your wits, your grit, your determination. You don't need him or his power, Woljif... but I need you."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5b_c_HoldHands: {n}Woljif grips your hand tightly, and remains silent for a moment before managing to choke out a quiet{/n} "Thanks, chief." {n}He takes a deep breath to compose himself, then looks at you with a smile, still holding your hand, before addressing Ygefeles.{/n} "Alright, gramps, I've made my decision."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5b_c_0017copy: {n}Woljif tosses the Moon of the Abyss in his hand.{/n} "This thing's beautiful and expensive, of course, and I'll miss it... but I don't need any suspicious crystals, y'know. I'll get rich after this trip and buy myself some ordinary ones."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5b_c_Embrace: {n}Woljif makes a halfhearted attempt to push you away, then pauses for a moment before giving in and wrapping his arms around you. His breath comes in ragged, forced bursts as he tries to stay composed. Eventually, his breathing steadies and slows, warm on your neck. Finally, he pulls away, wipes his eyes with his wrist, and laughs.{/n} "C'mon, chief, this is getting way too sappy! Whaddya say we loot this place, huh? Clear it out from top to bottom!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5c_c_BeliefLG: "You... You make me believe in stuff, y'know? Things like loyalty, trust, and honor... Things I always thought were a load of crap! And I mean, I still think it's crap, really..." {n}Woljif looks off into the distance, and his voice takes on a soft, almost reverent tone.{/n} "But when I'm with you, chief... It feels real."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5c_c_BeliefG: "You... You make me believe in stuff, y'know? Things like loyalty, trust, and compassion... Things I always thought were a load of crap! And I mean, I still think it's crap, really..." {n}Woljif looks off into the distance, and his voice takes on a soft, almost reverent tone.{/n} "But when I'm with you, chief... It feels real."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5c_c_BeliefL: "You... You make me believe in stuff, y'know? Things like loyalty, trust, and duty... Things I always thought were a load of crap! And I mean, I still think it's crap, really..." {n}Woljif looks off into the distance, and his voice takes on a soft, almost reverent tone.{/n} "But when I'm with you, chief... It feels real."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_5c_c_Belief: "You... You make me believe in stuff, y'know? Things like loyalty and trust... Things I always thought were a load of crap! And I mean, I still think it's crap, really..." {n}Woljif looks off into the distance, and his voice takes on a soft, almost reverent tone.{/n} "But when I'm with you, chief... It feels real."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_Nightmare: {n}You remain awake as most of the party sleeps, and after a time you begin to hear quiet gasps and whimpers nearby. Turning to the source of the sound, you see Woljif shivering and flinching in his sleep.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_Wake: {n}You gently shake Woljif's shoulder, and he startles awake with a gasp. He props himself up on his elbows, wide-eyed and breathing hard, and then heaves a sigh of relief.{/n} "Thanks for wakin' me up, chief. I was having some pretty nasty dreams, there."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_Ignore1: {n}If anything, Woljif's nightmare seems to be getting worse. At one point you even think you hear him mumble your name.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_Ignore2: {n}The tiefling's nightmare eventually passes, and you give it no more thought.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_WannaTalk: "Do you want to talk about it?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_NoBigDeal: {n}Woljif sits up on his bedroll and faces you, his tail tapping anxiously.{/n} "I mean... it was just a nightmare; no big deal." {n}He looks away and scratches the back of his neck awkwardly, but when he glances at you again and sees you patiently waiting for him to speak, he reluctantly continues.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_YouDied: "I, uh... I just dreamed that you... well, died." {n}Woljif bites his lip momentarily, and suddenly it's as if a dam has burst, and the words come pouring out of him.{/n} "You died, see, but the clerics couldn't bring you back for some reason. And- And I kept stealing more and more diamonds for 'em, but the spell just wouldn't work, so I started prayin' to the gods myself - every god I could think of - but they all just ignored me until I got to Shelyn."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_Shelyn: "The goddess of love and beauty? There must be some sort of significance to that."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_YourGod: {n}Woljif's tail flicks from side to side faster and faster.{/n} "Well, it's probably 'cause she's your goddess, you know? So I guess she had a stake in the outcome, too."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_IDunno: {n}Woljif's tail flicks from side to side faster and faster.{/n} "I dunno! It was just a dream, chief! It doesn't have to mean anything."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_AnsweredPrayer: "Well, Shelyn answered my prayer and, uh..." {n}He lowers his already-hushed voice in embarrassment.{/n} "She said she'd bring you back to life if, um... if I agreed to be one of her paladins."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_NeverImagined: "I never imagined you would ever consider becoming a paladin under any circumstances, let alone to save someone else."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_WaitWhy: "Wait, was this a nightmare because I died or because you had to become a paladin?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_ComeOn: "Oh, come on, it's not that bad!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_LosingMe: "So... you think losing me would be like losing a part of yourself? I'm touched."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_SeelahMentor: "You know, if you ever did want to become a paladin, I'm sure Seelah would be willing to take you under her wing."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_PCMentor: "You know, if you ever did want to become a paladin, I'd be happy to take you under my wing."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_JustADream: "Well, it was just a dream. I'm here, alive and well, and you don't have to become a paladin."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_a_Goodnight: "Alright, we should get some rest now. Good night."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_DontRemember: {n}It's hard to tell in the dark, but it looks like Woljif is blushing. He mumbles his answer all too quickly.{/n} "I-I don't remember."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_WorstNightmare: {n}There's a gleam of true terror in Woljif's eyes as he speaks.{/n} "Neither would I! Worst nightmare of my life! Ugh, it's enough to make me never wanna sleep again." {n}He lets out a strained, mirthless laugh.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_Both: "Both! I mean, a choice like that?" {n}Woljif furrows his brow seriously, his tail batting the ground in agitation.{/n} "You might as well ask me which arm I wanna cut off!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_Gag: {n}Woljif looks at you with a blend of skepticism and disdain.{/n} "You keep tellin' yourself that, chief." {n}He gags exaggeratedly to emphasize his point.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_Shudder: "I knew you'd see where I was comin' from, chief." {n}Woljif shudders at the thought.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_DontFlatterYourself: {n}Woljif chuckles quietly.{/n} "Don't flatter yourself, chief; I said bein' a paladin would be like getting a limb chopped off, too!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_NeverGonnaHappen: {n}Woljif stifles a laugh.{/n} "C'mon, chief, me and you both know that's never gonna happen!"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_NeverGonnaHappenBut: {n}Woljif stifles a laugh.{/n} "C'mon, chief, me and you both know that's never gonna happen!" {n}He smiles at you, tail swaying playfully.{/n} "But if it did, I wouldn't want anybody else but you showin' me the ropes." {n}He pauses for a moment, looking at you appraisingly, then adds,{/n} "Still not happenin', just so we're clear."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_KeepItThatWay: "And you better keep it that way, chief! Don't go dyin' on me, got it?"
NewDialogStrings.WRM_6_c_BackToSleep: "Yeah, I guess you're right. G'night, chief." {n}Woljif smiles nervously and settles back into his bedroll, but you get the distinct impression he's going to be staring sleeplessly into the darkness for a while.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_vel_c_RaisedEyebrow: {n}Woljif glances at you with an eyebrow raised in confusion.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_vel_c_InsideJoke: {n}Woljif smirks at you.{/n} "Like paying for expensive weddings."
NewDialogStrings.WRM_vel_c_OddLook: {n}Woljif gives you an odd look and opens his mouth to say something, but apparently decides against it. He remains silent and looks away, brow furrowed in deep through.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_vel_c_Duty: {n}Woljif rolls his eyes when he hears you talk about duty and responsibility, and pretends to stop listening. At Vellexia's words, however, you catch him glancing furtively at you, only to bite his lip and look away again as soon as he realizes you're watching.{/n}
NewDialogStrings.WRM_vel_c_TheyDoThat: "Yeah, {mf|he|she} tends to do that to people. You get used to it."
